00040 enum negative_policy {
00041     // This says it's signed, and is the default.
00042     p_signed_type,
00043 
00044     // This says it's unsigned, and to use the default negative policy (modulus
00045     // for fixed-length, throw_exception for variable-length).
00046     p_unsigned_type,
00047 
00048     // These say that it's unsigned, and to use the specific negative policy
00049     // named.
00050     p_modulus,
00051     p_throw_exception, // or return Not-a-Number for nothrow types
00052     p_force_zero,
00053     p_force_absolute
00054 };
00055 } // namespace detail
00056 #endif // BOOST_XINT_DOXYGEN_IGNORE

00344 // class fixed_functions, to handle fixed-specific stuff
00345 
00346 template <bitsize_t Bits, typename T, BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00347 class fixed_functions: virtual public integer_t_data<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS> {
00348     using integer_t_data<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Threadsafe;
00349     using integer_t_data<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Nothrow;
00350     using integer_t_data<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::Signed;
00351 
00352     public:
00353     T operator~() const {
00354         if (Nothrow) {
00355             if (integer_t_data<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::data.is_nan())
00356                 return detail::get_nan<T>();
00357             BOOST_XINT_TRY {
00358                 T r(~integer_t_data<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::data);
00359                 if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00360                 if (!Signed) r.data.negative = false;
00361                 else r.data.negative = !r.data.negative;
00362                 return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00363             } BOOST_XINT_CATCH {
00364                 return detail::get_nan<T>();
00365             }
00366         } else {
00367             T r(~integer_t_data<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::data);
00368             if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00369             if (!Signed) r.data.negative = false;
00370             else r.data.negative = !r.data.negative;
00371             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00372         }
00373     }
00374 };

00405 template <BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00406 class unsigned_negative_functions<p_modulus, BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>: virtual
00407     public integer_t_data<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>
00408 {
00409     // Types using unsigned_modulus must be fixedlength too.
00410     typedef typename integer_t_data<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::BitsType BitsType;
00411     BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(BitsType::value != 0);
00412 
00413     public:
00414     void _fix_negative_unsigned() {
00415         typename integer_t_data<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::datatype&
00416             data(integer_t_data<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::_data());
00417         data = ~data;
00418         ++data;
00419     }
00420 };
00421 
00422 template <BOOST_XINT_CLASS_APARAMS>
00423 class unsigned_negative_functions<p_throw_exception, BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>:
00424     virtual public integer_t_data<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>
00425 {
00426     public:
00427     void _fix_negative_unsigned() {
00428         if (integer_t_data<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::NothrowType::value) {
00429             integer_t_data<BOOST_XINT_APARAMS>::_data().make_nan();
00430         } else {
00431             exception_handler<>::call(__FILE__, __LINE__,
00432                 exceptions::cannot_represent("unsigned negative value"));
00433         }
00434     }
00435 };
